article_title: ‘Tiny acts of solidarity’ are bridging our social distance. Can they last?
article_description: Despite rules meant to keep us physically distant during the coronavirus pandemic  Canadians have managed to find new ways of coming together  observers say  Whether it will last is another question
article_content: VANCOUVER It s become something of a goosebump inducing ritual Each night at 7 p m  residents in this city open their windows or step onto their balconies to whoop  holler and bang their pots in a show of support for health care workers  shattering the eer   7867 chars
